update ts_resources
RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION = #{resourceDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE_URL = #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

RESOURCE_ICON = #{resourceIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
